name: Chef (Neda Games)
description:
Chef is a very addictive and entertaining game.

Juggle food.

Game instructions:

- Tap left and right buttons to juggle food.

- You will have to move the chef, so that the food does not fall to the ground.

- If the food touches the ground, you will lose a life.

- The food will fall randomly, having to place the chef in the correct position to turn the food.

- Randomly, from time to time the food will fall faster, lasting from 5 to 15 seconds and will return to its original speed and randomly the fast mode will be activated again, this applies to both game modes.

- Be careful with the cat because it can puncture the fillet, stopping or slowing down the fillet, the time the cat is activated and the duration of the retention of the fillet is random.

- Two game modes A and mode B:

Mode A, fast mode will be activated less frequently.

 Keep three foods in the air.

Mode B fast mode will be activated more frequently.

keep four foods in the air.

- Good luck and help the Chef to keep the food in the air.

Game features:

- Two game modes.

- Three lives.

- Steak, sausage, fish and chicken thigh.

- Restore game.

- Saved high score in both modes.

- Exit button.

- Action game with exciting sounds and animations.
